attack-object.name: Data Destruction
attack-object.comments: Azure Backup service provides defense against destruction/manipulation of data at rest. Scoring as "Significant" since it is an essential practice against data destruction et al, and can eradicate the threat event by restoring from backup.
attack-object.score-comment: Data backups provide a significant response to data destruction by enabling the restoration of data from backup.
